column2: They wish to make the world a place of smoky darkness where hope and cheer are crimes punishable by immediate slavery and slow torture. Theirs is an endless greed that neither time nor wealth can ever abate. They committed blasphemy by turning away from the Ancestor Gods and practicing magic. Magic, I tell you! They are our greatest shame and they will be dealt with, in time.\\n\\n - Cranneg Enlagsson, Dwarf Lorekeeper

[[img:bullet_def_slaves]][[/img]]Slaves: Used to unlock three powerful Legendarty Lords and other bonuses. Also boosts income at the cost of reduced public order.||[[img:bullet_chs_corruption]][[/img]]Chaos Corruption: Creeping, insidious, Ruin that can be spread within enemy territory, leading to public order issues and Chaos rebellions.||[[img:bullet_chs_units]][[/img]]Powerful unit roster with armoured infantry and monsters.
In the name of Hashut, we will march forth and drive the machine of war to sow misery and mayhem to all four corners of the world.
The history of many Exalted Heroes, recorded in scattered chronicles by the free people of the Old World, is a catalogue of woes and evil deeds.
The Champions of Chaos are cruel and to drill their troops ceaselessly, they themselves being paragons of deadly ability and lethal intent.
